channel.title: CVE Feed for OMRON Corporation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OMRON Corporation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-46282|2024-08-03T14:31:44.424Z -- omron%20corporation -- cx-drive
item.description: Use after free vulnerability in CX-Drive V3.00 and earlier allows a local attacker to execute arbitrary code by having a user to open a specially crafted file,

item.title: CVE-2022-25234|2024-08-03T04:36:06.429Z -- omron%20corporation -- cx-programmer
item.description: Out-of-bounds write vulnerability in CX-Programmer v9.76.1 and earlier which is a part of CX-One (v4.60) suite allows an attacker to cause information disclosure and/or arbitrary code execution by having a user to open a specially crafted CXP file. This vulnerability is different from CVE-2022-21124.

item.title: CVE-2022-25230|2024-08-03T04:36:06.681Z -- omron%20corporation -- cx-programmer
item.description: Use after free vulnerability in CX-Programmer v9.76.1 and earlier which is a part of CX-One (v4.60) suite allows an attacker to cause information disclosure and/or arbitrary code execution by having a user to open a specially crafted CXP file. This vulnerability is different from CVE-2022-25325.

item.title: CVE-2022-34151|2024-08-03T08:16:17.136Z -- omron%20corporation -- machine%20automation%20controller%20nj%20series%2C%20machine%20automation%20controller%20nx%20series%2C%20automation%20software%20%27sysmac%20studio%27%2C%20and%20programmable%20terminal%20%28pt%29%20na%20series
item.description: Use of hard-coded credentials vulnerability exists in Machine automation controller NJ series all models V 1.48 and earlier, Machine automation controller NX7 series all models V1.28 and earlier, Machine automation controller NX1 series all models V1.48 and earlier, Automation software 'Sysmac Studio' all models V1.49 and earlier, and Programmable Terminal (PT) NA series NA5-15W/NA5-12W/NA5-9W/NA5-7W models Runtime V1.15 and earlier, which may allow a remote attacker who successfully obtained the user credentials by analyzing the affected product to access the controller.

item.title: CVE-2022-33208|2024-08-03T08:01:20.422Z -- omron%20corporation -- machine%20automation%20controller%20nj%20series%2C%20machine%20automation%20controller%20nx%20series%2C%20automation%20software%20%27sysmac%20studio%27%2C%20and%20programmable%20terminal%20%28pt%29%20na%20series
item.description: Authentication bypass by capture-replay vulnerability exists in Machine automation controller NJ series all models V 1.48 and earlier, Machine automation controller NX7 series all models V1.28 and earlier, Machine automation controller NX1 series all models V1.48 and earlier, Automation software 'Sysmac Studio' all models V1.49 and earlier, and Programmable Terminal (PT) NA series NA5-15W/NA5-12W/NA5-9W/NA5-7W models Runtime V1.15 and earlier, which may allow a remote attacker who can analyze the communication between the affected controller and automation software 'Sysmac Studio' and/or a Programmable Terminal (PT) to access the controller.

item.title: CVE-2022-43667|2024-08-03T13:40:05.992Z -- omron%20corporation -- cx-programmer
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in CX-Programmer v.9.77 and earlier, which may lead to information disclosure and/or arbitrary code execution by having a user to open a specially crafted CXP file.

item.title: CVE-2022-21219|2024-08-03T02:31:59.068Z -- omron%20corporation -- cx-programmer
item.description: Out-of-bounds read vulnerability in CX-Programmer v9.76.1 and earlier which is a part of CX-One (v4.60) suite allows an attacker to cause information disclosure and/or arbitrary code execution by having a user to open a specially crafted CXP file.

item.title: CVE-2022-33971|2024-08-03T08:16:16.110Z -- omron%20corporation -- machine%20automation%20controller%20nj%20series%2C%20machine%20automation%20controller%20nx%20series%2C%20automation%20software%20%27sysmac%20studio%27%2C%20and%20programmable%20terminal%20%28pt%29%20na%20series
item.description: Authentication bypass by capture-replay vulnerability exists in Machine automation controller NX7 series all models V1.28 and earlier, Machine automation controller NX1 series all models V1.48 and earlier, and Machine automation controller NJ series all models V 1.48 and earlier, which may allow an adjacent attacker who can analyze the communication between the controller and the specific software used by OMRON internally to cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition or execute a malicious program.

item.title: CVE-2022-21124|2024-08-03T02:31:59.702Z -- omron%20corporation -- cx-programmer
item.description: Out-of-bounds write vulnerability in CX-Programmer v9.76.1 and earlier which is a part of CX-One (v4.60) suite allows an attacker to cause information disclosure and/or arbitrary code execution by having a user to open a specially crafted CXP file. This vulnerability is different from CVE-2022-25234.

This vulnerability is different from CVE-2022-25230.

item.description: Use-after free vulnerability exists in CX-Programmer v.9.77 and earlier, which may lead to information disclosure and/or arbitrary code execution by having a user to open a specially crafted CXP file.

item.description: Out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in CX-Programmer v.9.77 and earlier, which may lead to information disclosure and/or arbitrary code execution by having a user to open a specially crafted CXP file.

item.title: CVE-2024-33687|2024-08-02T02:36:04.543Z -- omron%20corporation -- nj%20series%20cpu%20unit
item.description: Insufficient verification of data authenticity issue exists in NJ Series CPU Unit all versions and NX Series CPU Unit all versions. If a user program in the affected product is altered, the product may not be able to detect the alteration.

item.title: CVE-2024-27121|2024-08-02T00:27:59.260Z -- omron%20corporation -- machine%20automation%20controller%20nj%20series
item.description: Path traversal vulnerability exists in Machine Automation Controller NJ Series and Machine Automation Controller NX Series. An arbitrary file in the affected product may be accessed or arbitrary code may be executed by processing a specially crafted request sent from a remote attacker with an administrative privilege. As for the details of the affected product names/versions, see the information provided by the vendor under [References] section.

item.title: CVE-2024-33687|2024-06-24T20:26:32.628Z -- omron%20corporation -- nj%20series%20cpu%20unit
item.description: Insufficient verification of data authenticity issue exists in NJ Series CPU Unit all versions and NX Series CPU Unit all versions. If a user program in the affected product is altered, the product may not be able to detect the alteration.

item.title: CVE-2024-27121|2024-03-12T07:55:48.301Z -- omron%20corporation -- machine%20automation%20controller%20nj%20series
item.description: Path traversal vulnerability exists in Machine Automation Controller NJ Series and Machine Automation Controller NX Series. An arbitrary file in the affected product may be accessed or arbitrary code may be executed by processing a specially crafted request sent from a remote attacker with an administrative privilege. As for the details of the affected product names/versions, see the information provided by the vendor under [References] section.

item.title: CVE-2024-31413|2024-06-04T17:36:59.028Z -- omron%20corporation -- cx-one%20cx-one%20cxone-al%5B%5D%5B%5Dd-v4
item.description: Free of pointer not at start of buffer vulnerability exists in CX-One CX-One CXONE-AL[][]D-V4 (The version which was installed with a DVD ver. 4.61.1 or lower, and was updated through CX-One V4 auto update in January 2024 or prior) and Sysmac Studio SYSMAC-SE2[][][] (The version which was installed with a DVD ver. 1.56 or lower, and was updated through Sysmac Studio V1 auto update in January 2024 or prior). Opening a specially crafted project file may lead to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-31412|2024-05-01T12:52:13.173Z -- omron%20corporation -- cx-programmer
item.description: Out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists in CX-Programmer included in CX-One CXONE-AL[][]D-V4 Ver. 9.81 or lower. Opening a specially crafted project file may lead to information disclosure and/or the product being crashed.

item.description: Insufficient verification of data authenticity issue exists in NJ Series CPU Unit all versions and NX Series CPU Unit all versions. If a user program in the affected product is altered, the product may not be able to detect the alteration.

Opening a specially crafted project file may lead to arbitrary code execution.
